comments: Usually publishes with J.F.Brunel with address as:Laboratoire de morphologie experimentale, Univ. L. Pasteur, Strasbourg.
examples: Phyllanthus fraternus G.L.Webster subsp. togoensis Jean F.Brunel & J.Roux Bull. Soc. Bot. France 122(3-4): 161. 1975.  Phyllanthus raynalii J.F.Brunel & J.Roux Willdenowia 14(2): 387. 1985 [1984 publ. 1985]
